name: Whispered Promises ~ 14 Days of Love with Anna
name_original: Whispered Promises ~ 14 Days of Love with Anna
description:
This is a SIM game in which you live with your childhood playmate who likes you the most.
In the fourteen days of the spring vacation, interact with Anna freely!
Whether it's simulation or multi-ending, this game has it all!!



♡Various Ero Situations

In most scenarios, the player is dominant, but sometimes Anna might be on top……
Anna will also have a different appearance according to different situations!

In addition, all Ero events are fully voiced!

♡Simple Training System

Whether it's studying, gaming, working, or even sex!
Enjoy your cohabiting freely!
And pick your story progression……?



♡Take a break with minigame?

Anna loves gaming!
Limit testing yourself with the high-end(?) minigame "Super Smash Sister" with Anna.



♡Intimate touch interactions

You can play pranks on Anna while she rests in the room.
Use Ero massage to make Anna cum!

♡Plentiful Cohabit Event

Whether it's heartwarming events or sex situations, experience Anna's diverse charms!



♡Easy-to-play Game System

Basic functions like text-skipping and fast-forward are must-haves,
text record, recollection, and even skipping the whole event are fully implemented!!
This is a game meant to be experienced relaxingly.




♡Koharu Anna(CV.神代そら)

Your childhood playmate and girlfriend who likes you and gaming the most.
She's naive and full of expressions.

During the first long-term cohabiting, we have to do a lot of naughty things──
She said that with a lot of energy.

What kind of ending these fourteen days of cohabitation will bring? Witness with your own eyes!!


  • Over 30 basic CGs
  • Rich text volume of over 100,000 words.
  • Recollection mode
  • Some scenes dubbed by voice actress (CV.神代そら)
  • Game time between 4~6 hours
